name: Steven Monroy
description: I am seeking for a soulmate,someone i will share the rest of my life with,a serious minded woman who is ready for a serious relationship that will lead to marriage,and a happy family. The most important qualities i seek in my ideal woman is Honesty,i really cherish honesty so much in a relationship,and also reliable,loving and caring woman. I have once had a relationship when i was in college,and i was really hurt,so i decide to remain single eversince cos i dont wanna get use by women or hurt again…that is why i am Looking for the Right Serious Ready Honest,the true love from a woman to meet in person to know each other better and spent the rest of my life with… I want to learn to fall in love again cos life without love is like a harp without strings and also as food is needed for the body, then same way love is needed for the soul. Food strengthens the soul. A person is incomplete without love. Hope to hear from you again,feel free to e-mail me any time.Love is not about finding the right person, but creating a right relationship. It’s not about how much love you have in the beginning but how much love you build till the end.” and also i beleive The seed of greatness in a man begins to blossom when the right woman is there to water it.” take care. Life is a journey of experience’s, and in this journey we meet many people each day. Some we forget the next moment, BUT some we cherish throughout our lives. It is these people who give a ‘true meaning’ to our lives.
